about_the_game:
Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack. Focus solely on the eight newly added patients by completing the Pediatric Infant Cases scenario that comes with this pack, or encounter them during the course of a 2 or 4 hour random shift!

New patients included with this Pediatric Infant Cases Package:

  • 42d F with fever x 1d
  • 10mo F with Seizure and Fever
  • 15d M with fever x 1d
  • 42d F with fever x 1d
  • 8mo M with severe resp distress
  • 6wk M with vomiting
  • 42d F with fever x 1d
  • 16d M with fever x 1d
detailed_description:
Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack. Focus solely on the eight newly added patients by completing the Pediatric Infant Cases scenario that comes with this pack, or encounter them during the course of a 2 or 4 hour random shift!

New patients included with this Pediatric Infant Cases Package:

  • 42d F with fever x 1d
  • 10mo F with Seizure and Fever
  • 15d M with fever x 1d
  • 42d F with fever x 1d
  • 8mo M with severe resp distress
  • 6wk M with vomiting
  • 42d F with fever x 1d
  • 16d M with fever x 1d

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 320 M
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 Sierra or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
